solution_line_template: A quarter of the workers equals {initial_employees} * {percentage_increase_numerator} / {percentage_denominator} = <<{initial_employees}*{percentage_increase_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={new_workers_added}>>{new_workers_added} workers.
There are now {initial_employees} + {new_workers_added} = <<{initial_employees}+{new_workers_added}={total_employees}>>{total_employees} employees in the factory.
